H0.text: It expands is what happens to the sugar when Jessica pours the powder into a container with sugar and water to make fruit punch for her friends.

H1.text: It dissolves is what happens to the sugar when Jessica pours the powder into a container with sugar and water to make fruit punch for her friends.

H2.text: It condenses when Jessica pours the powder into a container with sugar and water to make fruit punch for her friends.

H3.text: It evaporates when Jessica pours the powder into a container with sugar and water while making fruit punch for her friends.

A4.text: Dissolution (chemistry), or solvation, the interaction of a solvent with dissolved molecules
